name: What Remains of Nikola Tesla
description:
What Remains of Nikola Tesla: is survival horror experience where you play as a detective trying to find the last secret project Nikola Tesla worked on. It takes about 5 minutes to complete the game.

Hope you like it. What are your thoughts???

CONTROLS:

  • Move ----> WASD
  • Shift -----> Run
  • E ---------> Interact
  • F ---------> Flashlight
